name: The Road from Damascus
description: Nobody knows where the Mesos came from, nobody knows what the Mesos want. It is only known that they look like shadows, that they possess lethal telekinetic abilities, and that although it’s difficult, they can be killed. They first attacked mainland China, and have killed millions in the years following. Finally united, humanity has elected Syria as a stronghold, and the place they hope to turn the tide of battle. Play as Kamal, a 28 year old Indian refugee who fled her home once the Mesos attacked. Maneuver through the now war-torn city of Damascus, trying to survive by any means. Alongside your 5 year old son, Nihal, dodge the imminent threats from both humanity and the Mesos alike. Will you escape with your life from the most dangerous place on the planet? Will humanity finally be able to contest these alien beings? Is there a dark secret yet to be revealed about the son you walk hand-in-hand with? And will that secret be the key to humanity’s survival? Welcome to The Road from Damascus. We hope you can keep your feet on the ground. PLEASE PLAY GAME FULL SCREEN FOR BEST RESULTS.
